content: I've just realised that in some of my docs I use the words "project" and "package" interchangeably when talking about "a directory with a leanpkg.toml file in it". Are the words interchangeable? If not, which one should I be using?
I guess there is a psychological difference, especially you use other people packages in order to work on your own project
Or you could say that your project is to develop the package that you're interested in.
